title: been seeing "what I believe" is a font - can anyone figure out what it is please
author: GinaGinaGina

comments.content:
It looks like **Xtreem Fat Demo** by Måns Grebäck [2012, Free for personal use]  
You can download it here:  
 [http://www.fontspace.com/m%C3%A5ns-greb%C3%A4ck/xtreem-demo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110249/http:/www.fontspace.com/m%C3%A5ns-greb%C3%A4ck/xtreem-demo "http://www.fontspace.com/m%C3%A5ns-greb%C3%A4ck/xtreem-demo")  
(the page contains also information how to contact the designer for commercial use)

As sidenote, Xtreem **Demo** (for personal use only) is freely available to download on the official Aring Typeface (Måns Grebäck) [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724110249/http:/www.aringtypeface.com/xtreem). For commercial purpose, full version of Xtreem is available under licencing.
